description: This file defines a utility class `StringUtils` containing various string manipulation methods, including exception handling, case conversions, string padding, identifier creation, string comparison, random string generation, and encoding utilities.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for string manipulation, encoding, random string generation, and exception handling.

methods.name: getExceptionMessage
methods.description: Returns a meaningful message from an exception, or the class name if message is null.

methods.name: exceptionTrace
methods.description: Converts an exception's stack trace into a string, including the message and stack.

methods.name: length
methods.description: Returns the length of a string, or 0 if null.

methods.name: camelCase
methods.description: Converts underscore or space separated string into CamelCase.

methods.name: javaIdentifier
methods.description: Converts a string with underscores or spaces into a valid Java identifier with capitalized words.

methods.name: padStringBuffer
methods.description: Pads a StringBuffer with a specified character until it reaches a desired length.

methods.name: makeValidIdentifier
methods.description: Replaces spaces, hyphens, slashes, and commas with underscores to produce a valid identifier.

methods.name: substitute
methods.description: Replaces all occurrences of a search string within a StringBuffer with a replacement string.

methods.name: escapeQuotes
methods.description: Escapes double quotes in a string by prefixing them with a backslash.

methods.name: escapeTicks
methods.description: Escapes single quotes in a string by prefixing them with a backslash.

methods.name: trimQuotes
methods.description: Removes surrounding quotes or ticks from a string.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Checks if a string is null or empty after trimming.

methods.name: emptyIfNull
methods.description: Returns an empty string if input is null, otherwise returns the input.

methods.name: compare
methods.description: Compares two strings for equality, considering nulls.

methods.name: compare
methods.description: Comparates two strings for equality, ignoring case if specified.

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Compares two strings lexicographically, handling nulls.

methods.name: generateRandomString
methods.description: Generates a secure random alphanumeric string of specified length.

methods.name: generateRandomNumberString
methods.description: Generates a secure random numeric string of specified length.

methods.name: generateSecureRandomAlphaNumString
methods.description: Generates a secure random alphanumeric string using SHA-256 digest.

methods.name: convertToAlphaNumeric
methods.description: Converts a byte to an alpha-numeric character within specified bounds.

methods.name: lpad
methods.description: Left-pads a string with a specified character to a specified total length.

methods.name: zeroPad
methods.description: Pads a byte array with zeros up to a specified length.

methods.name: splitLines
methods.description: Splits a string into multiple lines at a specified line length, inserting CRLF.
